nì
to look askance at
косо смотреть на
rtega_mnemonic:
睨睨RS倪𠆔𧡎look askance at, glare at, slant
  • eye 目 glaring at one's naughty son 兒
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 兒 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
斜睨 [ xié nì ]: to cast sidelong glances at sb
睨视 [ nì shì ]: to look askance
睥睨 [ bì nì ]: to look disdainfully out of the corner of one's eye
睥睨一世 [ pì nì yī shì ]: to look scornfully at the whole world (idiom)
睥睨一切 [ pì nì yī qiè ]: to be overweening (idiom)

Ru_Meaning: glaring at, authority, power, scowl at
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the newborn babe (兒) uses its eye (目) to glare at you
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " eye ", the sound of " er " means squint. "Shuowen": "Look at it. From the eyes, the sound of the child." "Book of Rites-The Golden Mean": "When you hold the Ke to cut the Ke, look at it, you think you are far away."

" Sui " also generally refers to seeing and seeing. "Thirteen Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Ai Gong": "The purpose is that the wine will be prosperous, and Yu and the father of the brown will succumb to it." Du's note: "Sui, look at it."

" Sui " also means watching and looking back. Tang Huijing (Miscellaneous Words): "The northern Suishe city is still there, but the Nan Suizunling cave still exists."

" Sui " also means looking. "Mozi ‧ Jing Shuo 1": "Those who worry about it, ask for what they know, and don't have to get it, just like slumping."

" Sui " also refers to peeping. Ming Li Xu's "Manbi for the Elderly in Jie'an-Talking about Censorship": "The number of people in the house is increasing, and there are tens of thousands of people in the cellar. However, Fuzi is only a female, and there is a woman suitable for a certain person, who will keep it for a long time."

" Sui " also means skew. "Zhuangzi‧ Tianxia": "The Chinese side of the Japanese side squats, and the side of the thing is born and died."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " eye ", the sound of " er " means squint.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「兒」聲，表示斜視。《說文》：「衺視也。从目， 兒聲。」《禮記‧中庸》：「執柯以伐柯，睨而視之，猶以為遠。」

　　「睨」也泛指看、視。《左傳‧哀公十三年》：「旨酒一盛兮，余與褐之父睨之。」杜預注：「睨，視也。」

　　「睨」還表示顧視、回視。唐慧凈〈雜言〉：「北睨舍城池尚在，南睎尊嶺穴猶存。」

　　「睨」也表示尋視。《墨子‧經說上》：「慮也者，以其知有求也，而不必得之，若睨。」

　　「睨」亦指窺伺。明李詡《戒庵老人漫筆‧談參傳》：「參之貲日益，窖而藏者數萬計。然弗子，僅有女，女所適者某，睨其藏久之。」

　　「睨」還表示偏斜。《莊子‧天下》：「日方中方睨，物方生方死。」

從「 目 」，「 兒 」聲，表示斜視。《說文》：「衺視也。从目， 兒聲。」《禮記‧中庸》：「執柯以伐柯，睨而視之，猶以為遠。」 「 睨 」也泛指看、視。《左傳‧哀公十三年》：「旨酒一盛兮，余與褐之父睨之。」杜預注：「睨，視也。」 「 睨 」還表示顧視、回視。唐慧凈〈雜言〉：「北睨舍城池尚在，南睎尊嶺穴猶存。」 「 睨 」也表示尋視。《墨子‧經說上》：「慮也者，以其知有求也，而不必得之，若睨。」 「 睨 」亦指窺伺。明李詡《戒庵老人漫筆‧談參傳》：「參之貲日益，窖而藏者數萬計。然弗子，僅有女，女所適者某，睨其藏久之。」 「 睨 」還表示偏斜。《莊子‧天下》：「日方中方睨，物方生方死。」

"Book of Rites-The Golden Mean": "When you hold the Ke to cut the Ke, look at it, you think you are far away." " Sui" also generally refers to seeing and seeing. "Thirteen Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Ai Gong": "The purpose is that the wine will be prosperous, and Yu and the father of the brown will succumb to it." Du's note: "Sui, look at it." " Sui" also means watching and looking back. Tang Huijing (Miscellaneous Words): "The northern Suishe city is still there, but the Nan Suizunling cave still exists." " Sui" also means looking. "Mozi ‧ Jing Shuo 1": "Those who worry about it, ask for what they know, and don't have to get it, just like slumping." " Sui" also refers to peeping. Ming Li Xu's "Manbi for the Elderly in Jie'an-Talking about Censorship": "The number of people in the house is increasing, and there are tens of thousands of people in the cellar. However, Fuzi is only a female, and there is a woman suitable for a certain person, who will keep it for a long time." " Sui" also means skew. 睨字的基本解释

睨
nì
斜着眼睛看：睨视。睥睨。
偏斜：“日方中方睨”。

睨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nì］
［《廣韻》五計切，去霽，疑。］
“倪2”的被通假字。
(1)视。
(2)斜着眼（看）；斜视。
(3)顾视；回视。
(4)寻视。
(5)窥伺。
(6)偏斜。
(7)通“婗”。小儿。

睨字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　睨； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页811第08
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?研計切。音詣。【說文】袤視也。【左傳·哀十三年】余與褐之父睨之。【史記·藺相如傳】持璧睨柱。【屈原·離騷】忽臨睨夫舊鄉。　又禽鳥斜視亦曰睨。【埤雅】禽經曰：雞以嗔睨。【王楙補禽經】鴨以怒睨。　又日斜亦曰睨。【莊子·天下篇】日方中方睨。【衍義】日斜如人睨目。　又人名，睨夫。見【宋史·宗室表】。　又與倪堄通。睤睨，詳睤字註。　又【集韻】吾禮切，詣上聲。義同。

睨字的起名意思

暂无。

[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　睨; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 811 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Research and cut. Sound. 【Said the text】Look at everything. [Zuo Zhuan·Ai Thirteen Years] Yu Yuhu's father Suizhi. 【Historical Records·Lin Xiangru Biography】Holding a biscuit pillar. 【Qu Yuan·Lisao】Suddenly came to Suihu's hometown.　Birds and birds squint, they also say squint. [Piya] The Qin Jing said: The chicken is annoying. 【Wang Chu Sutra of Poultry Replenishment】Ducks are angry.　The sun is slanted and the sun is squinting. 【Zhuangzi·Tianxia】The Japanese side and the Chinese side squat. [Yan Yi] The sun is oblique like a person's eyes.　Another name, Suihu. See [Song History · Clan Table].　Connect with Ni Hun again. 睨
会意字。从目,古文字形体像眼睛,表示斜着眼睛看;从兒(儿),幼儿视力发育未全而目光难集中,或因好奇张望而目
光多斜视。本义指斜着眼睛看。
斜着眼睛看:一视|脾~。

眼|晚|

косо смотреть
Зная слово.
С точки зрения глаз древние иероглифы подобны глазам, что означает взгляд косыми глазами; у детей (детей) зрение не полностью развито и глаза трудно сосредоточить, или глаза часто прищуриваются из-за любопытства.
Первоначальное значение относится к взгляду по диагонали.
Раскосые глаза взгляд: взгляд | селезенка ~.
~ Как гордится ~ Селезенка ~ Косая ~
